title: Motorist and son observe road crossing near Spitler Woods State Park
observed: Me and my mom were driving home from dropping a friend off when about a 7 1/2-foot-tall creature ran across the road. It had brownish-red fur, its arms were longer than a human's could ever be. The whole thing lasted about 5 seconds.
location_details: A little gravel road by Spitler Woods State Park.
